content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Smelting Facility at Position (62.0, -53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (62.0, -53.0)

This facility is used for smelting iron ore into iron plates. The furnace is fueled with coal and processes iron ore to produce iron plates.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities without required items in inventory
- Ensure that you have the necessary items in your inventory before attempting to place an entity. For example, attempting to place a stone furnace without having one in inventory will result in an error.

### Errors due to insufficient resources for crafting
- Verify that you have all required resources before crafting an item. For instance, attempting to craft a stone furnace without sufficient stone will result in an error.

### Errors due to lack of fuel for operations
- Always check that you have enough fuel available for entities that require it, such as furnaces. An error will occur if you try to operate a furnace without coal.
